p: BEFV has been isolated from several mosquito and Culicoides species in Africa, Australia, and Central Asia ( 9), but there has been no record of the isolation of BEFV from invertebrate vectors in East Asia so far ( 28). A laboratory experimental infection of Culicoides biting midges indicated that, at the least, they are not efficient vectors of BEFV ( 272). The vector search will be essential to understand the epidemiology of BEFV in East Asia.
